name: SplitShot
description:
Shoot Aliens, Get Points, spend to keep yourself and the VIP structure alive.

Your goal is to fill the VIP's HP with the use of the computers in the room

just simply walk up to the top /bottomcomputer and press 1,2,3 to buy stuff like HP or Player Stats Upgrades.

Btw the P key does absolutely nothing when dead trust me guys

also the game may still have some glitches. I was unable to patch all of them in time before the deadline sorry :(
